resources.string: - Your password must contain at least one digit. - Your password must contain at least one lower case letter. - Your password must contain at least one upper case letter. - Your password must contain at least one special character such as @, #, $, %, ^, &, +, or =. - Your password must not contain any white spaces. - Your password must be at least 4 characters long.
- Your username must not contain any white spaces.
